manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MERRYBOX Over the Sink Dish Drying Rack MERRYBOX Over the Sink Dish Rack MERRYBOX 304 Stainless Steel Over the Sink Dish Drying Rack Silicone Wrapped Roll Up Over The Sink Dish Drying Rack 17.5" x 13" MERRYBOX 2-Tier Rustproof Dish Rack Under Sink Organizers and Storage White Size Length 33.4 - 41.3 inches Length 25 - 33 inches 11.8"D x 33.5"W x 21.5"H Length:17.5in Width:13in 16.6"D x 11.5"W x 13.8"H 15.9"*13.18"*9" More suitable scenarios Big & Small Family Big family Big family Kitchen, Pantry, Sink, Bathroom Kitchen, Pantry, Sink Kitchen, Pantry, Sink, Bathroom, Sturdy Material Carbon steel plus a layer of black baking paint Carbon steel plus a layer of black baking paint 304 Stainless steel plus a layer of silver baking paint Food Grade Silicone Carbon Steel, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene Plastic Length and Height ✓ ✓ ✓

MERRYBOX OVER THE SINK DISH DRYING RACK MEARSURE SINK SIZE BEFORE PURCHASE ! For a better fit, please measure your sink size is ≤ 40" and the height of the faucet ≤ 16.5" and countertop-cabinet distance ≥ 28"

EXCLUSIVE EXPANDABLE HEIGHT & LENGTH LENGTH(33.5 -41.33 in) expandable Note: For a better fit, please measure your sink size is ≤ 40 " and the height of the faucet ≤ 16.5" and countertop-cabinet distance ≥ 28" SIZE DETAILS: LARGE SIZE：Length：41.33" Height: 24.5" Width: 13" SMALL SIZE：Length：33" Height: 21" Width: 13"

Neat Kitchen, Happy Cooking! This multi-functional large dish drying rack over the sink is upgraded version, with one over sink dish drying rack, you could organize all of your dish, plates, fruits, chopsticks, cups, cutlery and other tableware together for space saving.

PRODUCT DETAILS Rustproof & Durable The dish drying rack uses advanced carbon steel and covered with high temperature coating finish, ensure long lasting durability, Rust Resistance and Scratch Resistance, easy to clean. Sense of Stability 4 non-slip suction cups at the foot bottom to improve the rack’s position, make it not lean forward or shake. Stable triangular structure with 2 sturdy legs at the bottom makes Over The Dish Drying Rack strong enough to hold plenty of stuffs. Automatic Drainage The enhanced hollow card slot is stronger to keep balance when store more dishes; removable design, convenient for adjust the assemblies by your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband first showed me the idea of using this and I thought it was dumb. I decided to give in and purchase it, and I was so wrong! This was one of the best things I’ve purchased on Amazon! Sturdy, easy to assemble, value for the money, and it holds way more dishes than any other drying rack PLUS it takes up zero counter space!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and Useful!
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with this dish rack. It's pretty well made for a "flat-box" item. It's better made than a lot of things you'd get at IKEA. Easy to put together and looks nice in my little kitchen. Frees up so much counter space too.Mine came well packed, without scratches or anything bent. All the hardware was labeled and easy to put together. Didn't really need the instructions. It was intuitive. The little suction cups that are on the bottom of the stand are cheap little things that will not seal to a clean, flat surface, but the rack itself is built pretty stable so you aren't relying on those little things anyway. Honestly, they are probably more useful in keeping the rack slightly elevated so that water doesn't get trapped between the metal of the rack and your countertop. If you look at them in that light, they are perfectly designed. I would recommend this rack to anyone who is considering getting one of this style. I looked at several that would fit my space and I'm not disappointed that I chose this one.Merrybox also reached out to me via email the day my package was delivered to make sure I had no trouble with my product. I appreciate a company that is proactive in its' customer support. I would buy from this company again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth it
reviews.reviewText: It is sturdy and does not rust. I absolutely love it. It makes dishes easier to drain from up top and it does not clutter my counter. Honestly I should have got the big one that way I can load it with even more LO. L.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Watch the video, but don't follow all of it!
reviews.reviewText: I have a galley kitchen. As the cook in the house, I'm always complaining - actually, more than that at times -about the lack of counter space. I've installed spice racks and shelves, but I thought that there was nothing else I could do except move until I saw this product. This product has given me some counter space from dumping my dish rack! I watched the video for this product. The guy is fast. He puts it together in no time on a counter. However, there are two problems with that video: (1) Chances are, you won't put it together that fast, and if you try to, you'll probably make a mistake. (2) There's no sink, and they don't put it over a sink. My advice that I learned the hard way is to always lay out and confirm your parts, and this manufacturer is smart enough to include extras, was when they don't, you'll invariably drop one or more and then won't find it for a few years, by which time you're wondering what it went to/came from. The other suggestions: take your time and, for this product, give yourself plenty of floor (or counter, but I don't have any of that, remember?) space. Here's the big suggestion: only put together the frame: the two sides and the back. Ideally, the holes for the snaps face away from you, but also don't snap them all in, as you'll probably be adjusting the width. The suction cups for this - and they provided extras - worked the best of any I've ever had. As for why only assemble the frame first, that's because your sink may have obstacles in the way of where the pics for this product intended them to go and it's also much, much easier to adjust the width of this product without all of the other paraphernalia attached. My sink's obstacles: I already had a sponge holder that I bought here at Amazon, and it happened to be the same color, rare luck. I had to move this product's sponge holder to the other side, the aforementioned knife holder to the side sink. I had a specialized faucet and a back wall, so I had to shimmy this product in. This is where you might have to return the product.There was no picture with or on the packaging, so I had to go back to this Amazon page to see it with "stuff" in it! I couldn't figure out what the knife holder was! I still don't know if I'll use it, as the knives that I use don't have huge handles. You may also find that you use parts of this for different purposes: for instance, we rarely use goblets, but that part holds other things, such as measuring cups and dish towels, well. I'm still experimenting with the various hooks. Decisions, decisions.Altogether, if you could use more counter space, this will do the job. It is set back enough from the front of your sink(s) so as to not interfere very much, though as you can see from my picture, it does not - unfortunately - prevent the sinks from filling up. Now if they only had a product that did that...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dont have space side to side..... GO UP!
reviews.reviewText: We have a small kitchen and counter space is of a premium. So not having space on the sides of our sink, we always had a dish rack in the one side of the sink. This over the sink drying rack has been a great addition to our kitchen. It gave us back our sink and looks good too. The rack itself matches all our appliances which are black and our accent pieces in our kitchen which are wrought iron decor. It's very easy to assemble (I'm 60+) I did it alone. You can re-arrange the baskets to your liking. the cup rack can go on either side of the baskets. I have since moved mine to the middle, so it drains into the sink and not on the counter. there are 6 hangers for your utensils to hang anywhere you like. It is also adjustable and very sturdy. This unit is one of the best purchases I have made. I've recommended it to several of my friends. If you're questioning whether or not to buy this unit.....BUY IT, YOU WON'T REGRET IT.CDL Tavares FL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a very sturdy product. It was easy to put together and my wife is very pleased with the appearance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as discribed
reviews.reviewText: This worked as described but came with no instructions just a picture took a little bit to put together. one piece was dented on the end and I had to straighten out to get the two pieces to fit. With that said It works great and I am glade that I bought it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this rack!!! 1. It gave me my counter space back. 2. The water from dishes drops right into sink. 3. I’ve had this rack for about a year no smell, no rust, no breaks, 4 I have very sharp knives and this rack has a special space so I’m not worried about cutting myself .
Me gustó mucho el producto quedo tal cual me lo imagine, también me gustó q se puede hacer más grande y llego antes de la fecha
